0rr + ALL : Thanks m8 !
Don´t forget, all XBMC Versions are based on the exact same source code ;-) We all just compile and some of us add some extra stuff . So, again, all versions share the same codebase - so its basically impossible that they differ in speed.
One thing comes to my mind : What maybe makes the GasGiver Releases sometimes look slow to you, is the Massive Milkdrop Megapack. If you enable this (depending on your HDD Speed, too) starting the Milkdrop Vis takes ´some time´ to load. If you dont like this, try a Milkdrop Vis Pack with less Presets, like e.g. BritneysPairs - it contains a small fraction of the Megapacks Visualization Presets, so it gets loaded WAY! faster than the MegaPack ...
... and yes ... that is the exact reason why the Milkdrop Megapack is not the default MilkDrop Preset anymore ;-)
can someone make a point list of how to make this work, and even better.. make one in swedish
Gas: I don't know why the previous releases were smaller. It makes sense if you say that they are based on the same source code and you changed to another preset pack. Maybe it was just that. =)
